title: Trump administration sues to block Calif. tuition breaks for migrants
description: The Justice Department has sued California, challenging laws providing in-state tuition and other financial assistance to undocumented immigrants in the state.

title: Charlotte immigration crackdown goes on, Homeland Security says, despite sheriff saying it ended
description: Law enforcement leaders in Charlotte, North Carolina, say a federal immigration crackdown centered around the city appears to be tapering off Thursday. But a Homeland Security official insists the operation will continue. Department of Homeland Security spokesperson Tricia McLaughlin says...

title: ‘Charlotte’s Web’ brings disputed ICE sightings to Rowan
description: SALISBURY — As Charlotte news stations report that Department of Homeland Security officials are beginning to end the “Charlotte’s Web” operation, the incident has left a confusing mark an hour north in Rowan County. Social media has been filled with reported sightings of Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) or Customs and Border Protection (CBP) officials in [...]

title: Meat and poultry industries use of child labor underscored by Virginia indictment
description: A federal Grand Jury indictment has been filed against multiple suspects, including four defendants, with names redacted, who were formerly employed with Fayette Industrial Services. They are being charged with harboring and employing undocumented immigrants, including children, while working for a poultry plant in Virginia’s Accomack County as a sanitation... Continue Reading

title: Treasury Plans To Change Tax Credit Eligibility; Critics Say It Will Hurt Immigrant Taxpayers
description: Tax experts say immigrants brought to the U.S. illegally by their parents as children and immigrants with Temporary Protected Status are most likely to be affected by the planned change.
